name: Mengtan
tagline: Miracles sometimes occur, but one has to work terribly for them.
body:
# Welcome to my GitHub Pages.
## If I can't waste life on someone I love, then I would rather waste my life on my own.
## I would rather loneliness hug me, let me in a quiet and beautiful loneliness.
## However, I don't want to touch those bodies that I don't like, to respond those sentences that I have no feeling, to hug those soul that I never have heartbeat.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
